name: Alchemist Blast
description:
Casual high score game made for the VIMJAM  (8 Bits to Infinity), made in solo by myself, Alariann (Alariann Games).  It's been started around 3 days before the deadline.

The goal is to go as high as possible!

Click on the upper part of the screen (when the tutorial is finished and the potion shop is closed) to jump in that direction!

For that, you can use potions that you throw while in midair (first click pauses the game so you have time to choose where you want the potion to explode).

The blue potions explosion give you a push in the desired direction. Click below you to push you upward, click on the side to be pushed to the other side etc...

 (blue potions give you a push, but later other potions will be added to the game with other cool effects!)
